description.hltext_display: Premafin: Unicredit esposta per 300 mln (Rep)
description.content:
ROMA (MF-DJ)--Proprio all'ultimo momento utile (la deadline scade oggi) Ligresti ce l'ha fatta e stamane a Lugano le banche creditrici di Premafin (Unicredit la piu' esposta, insieme a Mediobanca, Cariparma, Interbanca, Intesa, Banco Popolare e Bpm) firmeranno l'accordo di riscadenziamento del debito per 322 milioni.
E sarebbe stato raggiunto l'accordo, secondo quanto riportato da Repubblica, anche su un altro debito in scadenza sulle holding Sinergia-Imco. A quel livello, infatti, stanno per scadere rate per alcune decine di milioni, e su questa parte, il creditore - Unicredit - avrebbe gia' raggiunto l'accordo e la firma e' attesa nei prossimi giorni. Facendo i conti, dunque, Unicredit risulta molto esposta nei confronti del gruppo Ligresti: almeno 300 milioni, considerando la filiera Sinegia-Imco-Premafin; una settantina di milioni in piu' con le linee di credito operative su Fonsai. Forse e' anche per questo motivo che Unicredit si e' tenuta alla larga dal consorzio di garanzia per l'aumento di capitale. red/fra
(END) Dow Jones Newswires
Copyright (c) 2010 MF-Dow Jones News Srl.

description.hltext_display: Indonesia manufacturing to grow 5.2-6.1 pct in 2011 - minister
description.content:
JAKARTA, Dec 22 (Reuters) - Indonesia's manufacturing sector is expected to grow by 5.2-6.1 percent next year and export non-oil/gas products worth $92.26 billion, industry minister M.S. Hidayat said on Wednesday.
But the country's manufacturing industry -- including textiles and footwear -- needs investment of around 124.6 trillion rupiah ($13.78 billion) next year to reach the target, the minister said, in order to provide a total of 14.9 million jobs.
In the first nine months this year Indonesian manufacturing
grew by 4 percent from a year earlier, and Hidayat said growth was projected to surpass an initial full year target of 4.65 percent.
'This will be a significant increase from the 2009 industrial growth of 1.54 percent,' he said.
The Southeast Asia's largest economy is poised to expand 6 percent this year and 6.4 percent in 2011, the finance ministry has said.
($1 = 9,042 rupiah)
(Reporting by Yayat Supriatna; Writing by Aditya Suharmoko; Editing by David Fox) Keywords: INDONESIA ECONOMY/INDUSTRY
(aditya.suharmoko@thomsonreuters.com)(+62 21 384 6364 ext 911)(Reuters Messaging: aditya.suharmoko.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net)
COPYRIGHT

description.hltext_display: DP World sells majority stake in Australia terminals for $1.5 billion
description.content:
DP World operates box terminals at major Australian ports
Dubai-based ports operator DP World has sold 75% interest in its terminals in Australia to Citi Infrastructure Investors (CII) for $1.5 billion.
The company said Wednesday it will retain 25% stake in DP World Australia and will continue to provide management services to the five container terminals in Brisbane, Sydney, Melbourne, Adelaide and Fremantle.
The transaction values DP World Australia at an estimated $1.82 billion.
According to DP World, the purchase price includes repayment of "certain intercompany balances owing from DP World Australia to DP World Limited".
Proceeds from the sale will be used towards reducing its net debt "as part of our overall strategy to improve balance sheet flexibility", it said.
"This strategic partnership provides a great opportunity for DP World to remain actively involved in Australia whilst delivering on our strategy to monetise assets as part of DP World's ongoing goal to reduce leverage and focus on higher margin markets," said Yuvraj Narayan, chief financial officer of DP World.
"This transaction, including the benefits of the long-term management contract, will be earnings accretive for DP World from the time of completion."
"This transaction... will be earnings accretive for DP World from the time of completion."
The transaction is expected to be completed towards the end of the first quarter of 2011.
DP World Australia has been operating the box terminals, which have a combined handling capacity of 3.5 million twenty equivalent units (TEU) per annum, for over five years. According to the group, the terminals' handling capacity is equivalent to about 50% of the total Australian container market.
According to CII Co-Head Felicity Gates, the partnership represents an "attractive investment opportunity in an important and growing market".
"Australia is a key market for Citi Infrastructure Investors where we have been working for some time. We are delighted to be entering into a strategic partnership with DP World," said Gates.
DP World was advised by Deutsche Bank AG and Citigroup Global Markets. CII is advised by HSBC and UBS.
DP World's parent Dubai World said in November 2009 that it will be seeking a delay in repayment of some $59 billion debt to its creditors and property group Nakheel – as it restructures the group.
DP World, one of the world's largest global ports operator, have said it is not included in the restructuring process.

event_or_fact.property: This transaction... will be earnings accretive for DP World from the time of completion.
chief financial officer, DP World Limited

This strategic partnership provides a great opportunity for DP World to remain actively involved in Australia whilst delivering on our strategy to monetise assets as part of DP World's ongoing goal to reduce leverage and focus on higher margin markets; Th
chief financial officer, DP World Limited

description.hltext_display: Penney wins second straight player of week award
description.content:
Kirk Penney's prominent role in the NZ Breakers' charge to the top of the ANBL table has been recognised with his second straight player of the week award.
The New Zealand superstar led the surging Breakers to a sweep of their road-double at the weekend, topping the scoring in both games as the Kiwi club extended their outstanding away record to 6-1 with wins at the Wollongong Hawks and Melbourne Tigers.
The Breakers have now won their past five games and have nudged the Hawks off the top of the table with a 10-2 record heading into the Christmas break.
Penney averaged 23.5 points, 3.0 rebounds, 2.0 assists and 1.0 steals for the round, and did so in pretty efficient fashion. He shot the ball at 48.5 per cent from the field, 50 from beyond the arc and slotted nearly 78 per cent of his free-throws.
In a top-of-the-table clash with the Hawks on Friday night, Penney scored 22 points, and had four rebounds, three assists and two steals as the Breakers snapped Wollongongs 15-game home winning streak with an 89-85 victory.
Penney and the Breakers then backed up 24 hours later in Melbourne with a 90-80 win over the Tigers, with Penney slotting a game-high 25 points, 16 of them comign in the final quarter.
Perth's Shawn Redhage was probably Penney's closest challenger after amassing 27 points and 10 rebounds in a hard-fought 87-84 win over the Sydney Kings at Challenge Stadium on Sunday.
Wollongong's Gary Ervin also went close to his second award after scoring a game-high 31 points and adding seven assists, four rebounds and three steals in the Hawks' loss to Penney's Breakers.
The Breakers have the pre-Christmas round off and return to action with a New Year's Eve visit to the Townsville Crocodiles.
2010/11 NBL player of the week winners Round 1 Julian Khazzouh (Sydney Kings) Round 2 Gary Ervin (Wollongong Hawks) Round 3 Luke Schenscher (Townsville Crocodiles) Round 4 Gary Wilkinson (New Zealand Breakers) Round 5 Shawn Redhage (Perth Wildcats) Round 6 Oscar Forman (Hawks) Round 7 Michael Cedar (Crocodiles) Round 8 Corey Williams (Melbourne Tigers) Round 9 Kirk Penney (Breakers) Round 10 Kirk Penney (Breakers)

description.hltext_display: Intesa Sanpaolo: Bazoli si confronta coi soci sul piano (MF)
description.content:
MILANO (MF-DJ)--Il presidente del consiglio di sorveglianza di Intesa Sanpaolo, Giovanni Bazoli, torna a sottolineare il ruolo chiave delle Fondazioni nel sostegno del sistema bancario italiano e annuncia che gli enti azionisti della Ca' de Sass saranno consultati in vista della definizione del piano di impresa della banca, che dovrebbe essere pronto entro l'estate. "Adesso che c'e' il piano industriale", ha detto Bazoli, "e' chiaro che sentiremo anche le Fondazioni per stabilire quali sono le linee".
Il presidente di Intesa Sanpaolo, si legge in un articolo di MF, ha inoltre escluso che l'istituto possa avere bisogno di aumentare il capitale al fine di adeguarsi ai requisiti di Basilea 3. "In questo momento non e' assolutamente prevista una cosa del genere" ha tagliato corto Bazoli. Per quanto riguarda invece la possibilita' che Jean Paul Fitoussi lasci il consiglio di sorveglianza di Intesa Sanpaolo dopo la decisione del Credit Agricole di procedere a uno smobilizzo, anche se non immediato, della quota nella banca italiana, Bazoli ha commentato: "vedremo. La mia personale valutazione e' che un consigliere non ha vincolo di mandato, quindi non vedo ragioni per cui dovrebbe dare le dimissioni".
Lo scioglimento dell'intreccio tra Ca' de Sass e la banque verte arriva, forse nemmeno tanto per caso, nel momento in cui l'Antitrust si appresta a dare il via libera alla riorganizzazione delle attivita' assicurative della banca italiana. red/alb alberto.chimenti@mfdowjones.it
(END) Dow Jones Newswires
Copyright (c) 2010 MF-Dow Jones News Srl.

description.hltext_display: 男子持刀闯入中山六路一银行抢劫 已被警方带走
description.author: news@rednet.cn
description.content:
今日中午12时许，一名青年男子持刀闯入中山六路XX发展银行越秀支行营业大厅，意欲抢劫当时正在银行取钱的两位女性，警察接报后迅速赶赴现场将男子制服带走，据目击者称，现场无人受伤，男子与被抢劫的两名女事主可能认识，在被带走过程中一言不发。目前该银行仍未恢复营业。
[稿源：大洋网]
[编辑：蔡娟]

description.hltext_display: MARC affirms Malaysia Dutaland notes
description.content: KUALA LUMPUR, Dec 22 - MARC has affirmed the rating of DutaLand Berhad's outstanding RM26.3 million Redeemable Unsecured Loan Stocks at B. The outlook is revised from negative to stable. The affirmed rating and outlook revision incorporates DutaLand's improved operating performance, although earnings remain vulnerable to the company's ability to execute the later phases of its high-end property development project and its sizeable borrowings relative to its cash generation ability. While DutaLand has met its debt maturity of RM8.9 million under the RULS in April 2010, MARC believes significant risk persists in fulfilling future obligations given its weak liquidity position that has been supported by asset disposals. DutaLand derives its earnings from two main business segments, namely property development and oil palm cultivation. The progress in its major property project, the 73-acre Kenny Heights Development jointly undertaken with related company Olympia Industries Berhad, has been slow. To date, of the nine parcels in KHD, development activities have commenced in only one, comprising 49 villas with a gross development value of RM219 million. While DutaLand has earmarked the launch of luxury condominiums for a second parcel in 1Q2011, MARC opines that the funding for the project may pose a challenge given its current liquidity position, although any launch deferment may affect its earnings in fiscal 2011. MARC also notes that the group's earnings from its palm oil division has been halved in financial year ended June 30, 2010 following the sharp reduction in its matured oil palm acreage with the sale of one of its two plantation subsidiaries. Nevertheless, the group would be able to generate a steady income going forward from its plantation division in view of the improved outlook for crude palm oil prices. For FY2010, DutaLand's revenue increased 20.6% to RM121.1 million year-on-year due to higher revenue of RM41.2 million recognised in respect of its property development operations. Nonetheless, it registered lower pre-tax profit of RM16.6 million compared to RM77.9 million in FY2009 due to absence of gains from disposal of subsidiary and write-back of provisions which had collectively amounted to RM104.7 million in 2009. DutaLand's overall cash flow profile continues to be supported by one-off items with disposal of land and properties amounting to RM34.6 million, without which the group's cash flow from operations of RM10.1 million (FY2009: -RM1.1 million) would be insufficient to meet its financing costs of RM17.3 million and other scheduled debt redemptions. MARC notes that DutaLand's cash flow generation ability remains weak and its debt repayment capacity continues to be reliant on asset disposals. For the first quarter ended September 30, 2010 , the group reported a RM2.7 million increase in revenue over the corresponding quarter mainly on the back of improved CPO prices, and posted a pre-tax profit of RM1.6 million aided by a gain on unrealised foreign exchange of RM3.4 million. Notwithstanding the group's debt-to-equity ratio of a low 0.26 times , DutaLand's consolidated liquidity remains minimal at RM7.0 million in relation to its short-term obligations of RM74.0 million as of September 30, 2010. In view of this, MARC expects DutaLand to initiate timely measures, including asset disposal, to meet its next scheduled repayment of RM5.6 million in April 2011.

description.hltext_display: Holiday rituals and 2011 resolves
Региональный рынок труда оживает
[숭실대]산타가 된 대학... 대학 최초 ‘성탄 특별장학금’
description.content: 광고 · 총 808명에게 800,000원씩 지급…학생들은 헌혈증 기부하며 ‘사랑 선순환’숭실대학교(총장 김대근)는 22일 “대학 최초로 ‘성탄 특별장학금’을 신설하여 연말 소외된 재학생 800여 명에게 장학금을 지급했다”고 밝혔다. 숭실대는 2010학년도 2학기 장학금을 한 번도 수혜하지 못한 학생 가운데 가정 형편이 어려운 학생들을 대상으로 ‘성탄절 특별장학금’을 시행하여 총 808명에게 800,000원씩의 장학금을 지급했다. 숭실대는 이를 위해 6억여 원의 예산을 별도로 책정하여 연말 소외된 학생들에게 ‘통큰’ 크리스마스 선물을 선사했다.이 장학금은 건강보험료 납부액이 적고, 가산점 항목이 고득점인 순으로 수혜의 우선권을 부여했다. 가산점 항목은 △기혼 및 부양 자녀를 둔 학생 △본인이 가장인 학생: 양친 모두 사별한 경우 △본인 및 부모·형제에게 장애(4급 이상)가 있는 학생 △한부모 가정의 학생: 부 또는 모가 이혼 또는 사별한 경우 △다자녀 가구의 학생: 본인 포함 3명 이상 등이다.한편, 이 장학금을 받은 학생들 중 258명의 학생들이 “어려운 이웃을 위해 써달라”며 808장의 헌혈증을 학교에 전달했다. 박상길 학생(기독교학과 3학년)은 31장의 헌혈증을 내놓기도 했다. 숭실대는 이 헌혈증을 성탄절 즈음하여 대한적십자사에 기증할 예정이다.조단비/인터넷 경향신문 대학생기자 (웹場 baram.khan.co.kr)- ⓒ 경향신문 & 경향닷컴(www.khan.co.kr), 무단전재 및 재배포 금지〈경향닷컴은 한국온라인신문협회(www.kona.or.kr)의 디지털뉴스이용규칙에 따른 저작권을 행사합니다.〉

description.hltext_display: Jižní Morava: Teploty vystoupají až na 7 stupňů Celsia
description.content: Další oteplení čeká dnes lidi na jižní Moravě. Podle meteorologů by dnes už nemělo mrznout a teploty vystoupí k pěti stupňům Celsia. Ve východní části kraje pak může být až o dva stupně tepleji. Tam může být dokonce i polojasno, ve zbytku kraje pak bude oblačno až zataženo. Místy se mohou objevit také mlhy a mrholení, které může po ránu namrzat. (jgn)

description.hltext_display: Сердечні справи
El Plebiscito de 1980: un mandato pendiente
description.content:
El Plebiscito de 1980 rechazó la reforma de la Constitución y simultáneamente el Artículo 236 incorporado a dicho proyecto, que pretendía convalidar los actos administrativos, legales y constitucionales del gobierno de facto. El Cuerpo Electoral al rechazar el artículo anuló dichos actos.
En 1985 la Ley 15738 estableció que los Actos Legislativos del Consejo de Estado "son radicalmente nulos, por emanar de un órgano inexistente para la Constitución de la República y por haber sido dictados sin seguir los procedimientos que ésta prescribe."
Estos dos principios se imponen en forma absoluta, a los 19 Actos Constitucionales por ser "decretos" emitidos por el Poder Ejecutivo ejercido por el dictador de turno.
Sin embargo tres artículos "constitucionales" del Acto 9 sobrevivieron en Democracia, contrariando el voto popular.
El Dr. Julio Prat, quien fue uno de los co-redactores del Acto 9, expone en su libro de 1980, "Seguridad Social y Acto Institucional No.9" la profunda reforma del sistema jubilatorio realizada por el gobierno de facto.
Esto lo corrobora la Exposición de Motivos del Acto 9 que dice: "Una revisión integral de nuestro sistema... debe hacerse mediante un Acto Institucional particularmente en este caso por constituir una reforma de preceptos constitucionales."
Esta afirmación hace insostenible la tesis de que la mera cita del Acto 9 por una ley común convalida las reformas constitucionales incluidas en dicho acto, eludiendo el Artículo 331 de la Constitución.
Pero hay más, los textos del Acto 9 se apartan drásticamente de la Constitución.
1.Por el Artículo 1º del Acto 9 las jubilaciones son Prestaciones. Para el Artículo 67 de la Constitución (Plebiscito de 1989) son Seguros Sociales.
La Constitución garantiza retiros adecuados. El Acto 9 procura un grado suficiente de bienestar. Ello contradice la justicia del retiro adecuado basado en los aportes realizados. Para el Acto 9 se trata de individuos que reciben graciosamente una prestación. Para la Constitución son trabajadores con derechos adquiridos que han aportado al sistema.
2. En la Constitución la asistencia financiera del Estado es un mandato. El Acto 9, en 1979, por el viciado Principio de Suficiencia se opone de modo radical a la asistencia al propiciar los topes.
El Plebiscito de 1989, estableció que si hay insuficiencia en los aportes se debe suplir obligatoriamente con impuestos anulando nueva y categóricamente el Principio de Suficiencia.
No obstante, este Principio sigue de hecho en uso, y limita las jubilaciones a niveles perversos sin necesidad de demostrar su juridicidad ni demostrar cuantitativamente la insuficiencia. El más vergonzante procedimiento para eludir el mandato constitucional fue la congelación intencional del Salario Mínimo Nacional, por el Poder Ejecutivo. Su ilegalidad contradice también la definición del SMN y su muy disminuido valor se convirtió por ley en las adulteradas Bases de Prestaciones y Contribuciones.
Aun cuando el Principio de Suficiencia del Acto 9 fuera legítimo, hoy, que hay recursos, no existe un mecanismo para reajustar el sistema a consecuencia de la Ley candado 18119 manteniendo el nivel de subconsumo (Colotuzzo) con 4.8 salarios mínimos, muy alejados de los 15 establecidos "generosamente" por Aparicio Méndez.
3. El artículo 72 del Acto 9 facultaba al Poder Ejecutivo a elevar el tope hasta 15 Salarios Mínimos en función de las posibilidades financieras. Esta facultad fue reiteradamente rechazada por la Administración incumpliendo varias leyes y finalmente fue derogada por la Ley 18.119.
El Dr. Rodolfo Saldain ex - presidente del BPS denuncia (El País 19/07/1991) "el uso abusivo del nivel de las jubilaciones como variable de ajuste, incumpliendo obligaciones con los beneficiarios" y agrega "Allí radica la causa principal de la reforma constitucional plebiscitada en noviembre de 1989 que tiene por objeto básico poner fin al uso del nivel real de las pasividades como variable de ajuste del sistema." Sin embargo, la democracia directa fue derrotada por segunda vez al evitarse la aplicación del Plebiscito de 1989.
Este fue un referéndum constitucional convocado directamente por los ciudadanos. Sus líderes fueron Luis Colotuzzo, Mario Cantón y Ernesto Murro.
El abuso de la congelación del S.M.N. por decretos del Poder Ejecutivo le sacó del bolsillo a los jubilados lo que creían habían conseguido por el Plebiscito de 1989.
La Ley 18119 fue el golpe de gracia a los derechos adquiridos de los jubilados por el Acto 9. Después de 25 años de frustradas y burladas esperanzas se establece el inicuo tope de 4.8 salarios mínimos, equivalente a la canasta de pobreza.
Esta intransigente política no es atribuible al gobierno de facto, porque nunca se llegó a los salarios mínimos previstos en el Acto 9, el cual también fue adulterado, como lo demuestra la Ley 18.119.
Los jubilados por el Acto 9 conforman un grupo en vías de extinción. Las deliberadas demoras siguen reduciendo dramáticamente el número de este grupo.
Este inhumano proceso lo exponen las 12 patéticas páginas de la versión taquigráfica de la Comisión de Seguridad Social de la Cámara de Diputados No. 631 de 2006.
Alli se reconocen las demoras, las chicanas, el destrato y la discriminación. Las víctimas solo reclamaban el cumplimiento de la ley y superar el subconsumo. (Colotuzzo)..
La formal promesa de solucionarlo tampoco fue honrada por causa de la deshonorable Ley 18119. Las víctimas del Acto 9 en 30 años no lograron la aplicación anulatoria de dos Plebiscitos ni la ley 15.738. La nulidad de las normas del gobierno de facto tiene efecto retroactivo como se postuló en 1985 en el Senado. Desterrar definitivamente los topes para el diezmado grupo que transita las franjas etarias de los 80 y los 90, cuyos derechos fueron arrasados, permitirá celebrar en forma integral el rechazo de la Reforma de 1980.

description.hltext_display: We won't be fooled by Johnson again - Pietersen
description.content:
England were blindsided by the intensity of paceman Mitchell Johnson's swing during their third test defeat to Australia in Perth, but would not be caught out again in Melbourne, batsman Kevin Pietersen warned on Wednesday.
Johnson ripped apart England's top order in the first innings with a match-turning six wicket haul that propelled Australia to an emphatic 267-run victory that levelled the five-match series at 1-1.
"(It) Definitely took us by surprise, for sure, but he bowled well, bowled really, really well, he bowled a really good game of cricket, Pietersen, who was trapped lbw for a duck by Johnson in Perth, told reporters.
"Obviously we're going to prepare ourselves for that swinging ball. We knew he was going to swing it, but we didn't think he was going to swing it that much."
Johnson said he had enjoyed taking Pietersen's wicket and described him as a 'smart-arse' after the South Africa-born batsman had asked him teasingly for his phone number so they could be 'best mates'.
Johnson declined to give it, and Pietersen, who remains firm friends with Australia's retired legspinner Shane Warne, confirmed the players were far from being on good terms.
"I don't have a relationship with Mitchell Johnson," Pietersen said, repeating himself when pushed to clarify.
Australia's bowlers credited their improved performance at Perth in part to a renewed aggression that saw them exchange heated words with a number of English batsmen amid peppering them with volleys of furious short-pitched bowling.
Pietersen denied England had been unsettled by any verbal attacks and said he had heard worse when facing the likes of Australias Warne and retired paceman Glenn McGrath during England's last Ashes tour four years ago.
RED MIST
"I haven't seen or heard anything different to anything that's happened in the first two test matches let alone last year in England," he said.
"There's not really any big chirpers or big sledgers.
"It's just England versus Australia, it's an Ashes series. Blokes get a bit of red mist occasionally.
"It's historic, it's huge, but there's nothing that's been overboard and if things go overboard, match referees deal with stuff like that."
Pietersen also shrugged off controversy over the choice of pitch at the Melbourne Cricket Ground where the fourth test gets underway on Sunday.
Pitches for the MCG are dropped into the oval and English media have cried foul that the head groundsman would choose a grassier wicket more suited to Australia's quicks rather than a drier track that might favour England and particularly, spinner Graeme Swann.
"Of course, they're going to do it, they just had success in Perth with a bouncy wicket, but we've had success around the world with bouncy wickets," Pietersen said, attributing England's loss to their disastrous first innings collapse, rather than the pitch.
"We lost that test match in half an hour, (with) five (wickets) for 20, that's where we lost that test match."

description.hltext_display: William唔敢Check阿Sa工作表
广州一男子持刀闯银行 大批警察封锁现场(图)
description.author: news@rednet.cn
description.content:
相关报道：男子持刀闯入中山六路一银行抢劫 已被警方带走
南方网12月22日报道 大批警察突然封锁广州中山六路新宝利大厦一楼深圳发展银行广州越秀支行营业大厅，之后一名男子被警察带走。据目击者称，今日中午12时许，一男子持刀闯入该行营业大厅。该男子持刀进入银行大厅后，劫持了一名正在柜台办理业务的女子，并声称抢钱！
男子约30岁、身高1米7左右、体态微胖，被警察带走过程中一言不发。目前该银行仍未恢复营业，银行工作人员也未对此事进行解释。
[稿源：南方网]
[作者：陈良军等]
[编辑：蔡娟]

description.hltext_display: Prada: ricompra immobili per 50 mln (MF)
description.content:
MILANO (MF)--Ritorno a casa per Prada. Superata la fase piu' critica, il gruppo del lusso di Patrizio Bertelli e Miuccia Prada ricompra alcuni degli immobili che aveva ceduto nel gennaio del 2005 al fondo Spazio Industriale con un'operazione di sale & lease back, cioe' vendita e riaffitto degli stessi edifici.
A essere riacquistati, si legge in un articolo di MF, sono i due edifici di Montevarchi, e quelli di Arezzo e Montegranaro, che oggi ospitano gli impianti piu' avanzati del gruppo, cedute all'epoca a Spazio Industriale, fondo immobiliare chiuso gestito da Prelios sgr. I quattro immobili (66.240 metri quadrati di superficie) insieme ad altri tre erano stati ceduti per 77 mln euro, e ora vengono ricomprati, senza maggiorazioni, per 50 mln. red/alb alberto.chimenti@mfdowjones.it
(END) Dow Jones Newswires
Copyright (c) 2010 MF-Dow Jones News Srl.

description.hltext_display: [전남대]재학생들 앱개발 대회서 두각
description.content: · ‘공공 DB를 활용한 1인 창조기업 앱개발 대회’에서 우수상 등 수상전남대학교 정보전산원(원장 최덕재 교수)에서 운영하는 ‘CNU IT 프론티어 인큐베이팅’ 소속 학생들이 광주광역시가 주최한 ‘공공 DB를 활용한 1인 창조기업 앱개발 대회’에서 우수한 성적으로 입상했다. 이번 대회는 1인 창조기업이 공공 DB를 활용해 공공성 및 수익성을 창출할 수 있도록 유도하기 위해 중소기업청과 4개 광역지자체가 공동주최한 행사로 총 112개의 앱 중 26개의 앱이 우수작으로 선정됐다. 이 중 전남대학교 프론티어 인큐베이팅 소속 학생들 3팀은 우수상(박광천(전자컴퓨터 석사1), 최태양(전자4) : 광주 맛집 Map), 장려상(김수경(전자4) : 2015 광주 하계 유니버시아드), 입선(허용우(전자3) : 남도문화탐방-남도, 어디까지 가봤니?) 등을 각각 수상했다. ‘광주 맛집 Map’은 각 구별로 맛집에 대한 상세정보를 제공하고, 즐겨찾기 선택과 별점평가도 가능하다. ‘2015 광주 하계 유니버시아드’는 대회와 관련한 홍보동영상과 경기장 안내, 자원봉사 참여정보 등의 내용으로 구성되어 있다. 또 ‘남도문화탐방-남도, 어디까지 가봤니?’는 남도의 관광명소, 남도문화유산, 웰빙/레저, 숙박, 교통, 음식 등을 소개하고 지역, 일정, 계절, 대상 등을 입력하면 다양한 코스를 안내해 준다. 중소기업청은 이번에 선정한 앱들을 앱스토어에 등록해 2011년 1월 이후 스마트폰을 이용하는 국민이면 누구나 무료로 다운받아 활용할 수 있도록 할 방침이다. 한편 전남대학교 정보전산원은 ㈜KT와 함께 ‘CNU IT 프론티어 인큐베이팅 프로젝트’를 추진, 재학생 중 IT분야에 관심과 도전정신이 강한 학생들을 발굴해 지원하고 있으며 2011년 1월 중 프론티어 인큐베이팅 프로젝트에 참여할 2기 학생들을 모집할 계획이다. 김고은/인터넷 경향신문 대학생기자 (웹場 baram.khan.co.kr)- ⓒ 경향신문 & 경향닷컴(www.khan.co.kr), 무단전재 및 재배포 금지〈경향닷컴은 한국온라인신문협회(www.kona.or.kr)의 디지털뉴스이용규칙에 따른 저작권을 행사합니다.〉

description.hltext_display: Сквер чи каплиця?
Brno: Hasiči museli k hořícímu elektrorozvaděči
description.content:
Požár elektrorozvaděče v jednom z domů v ulici Pod kaplí v brněnských Soběšicích zalarmoval v noci na dnešek brněnské hasiče. Devět minut po půlnoci k ohni vyjela jednotka z Lidické ulice v Brně. Když hasiči na místo přijeli, zjistili, že v rozvaděči hořela elektroinstalace. Ještě před jejich příjezdem ji ale lidé uhasili práškovým hasicím přístrojem. (jgn)

description.hltext_display: 'Kitchen cabinet' provides advice, support to Ellen Story
Una derrota del oscurantismo
description.content:
Por fin, ha prevalecido la razón por encima del dogma: todos los prestadores de salud que integran los sistemas público y privado deberán disponer de clínicas de salud sexual de modo de brindarles a sus beneficiarios la atención en esa área específica.
Poco a poco se ha ido tomando conciencia de que el concepto de salud debe ser mucho más abarcativo de lo que ha sido tradicionalmente, cuando no sólo la sexualidad estaba puntillosamente excluida de los servicios sanitarios, sino que también lo estaban la atención psicológica y la odontológica; daba la impresión de que el sexo, el alma y la boca no formaran parte del todo que es el cuerpo humano.
Felizmente, esa concepción arbitrariamente parcializada y excluyente de la salud ha sido sustituida por otra, abarcadora e incluyente, que contempla todos los aspectos vinculados con el bienestar del individuo. De la misma manera que la Reforma de la Salud impulsada por el gobierno del doctor Tabaré Vázquez propendió a universalizar la atención sanitaria de modo de asegurar la cobertura de salud a todos los habitantes de la República, la inclusión de esas otras áreas hasta entonces al margen de la cobertura brindada por el sistema, tiende a hacer efectivo ese nuevo concepto de lo que debe entenderse por el término salud.
Son conquistas de enorme relevancia que suponen cambios cualitativos verdaderamente revolucionarios. Basta echarle una ojeada a lo que era la atención de la salud a mediados del siglo pasado para comprender cabalmente el significado de dichas conquistas.
Entrando en el ámbito específico de la salud sexual y reproductiva, hay que reconocer que la inclusión de clínicas especializadas en todos los prestadores de salud adquiere una dimensión particular, en virtud de la férrea y medieval oposición que tal disposición encontró de parte de las autoridades eclesiásticas, aferradas a una mentalidad retrógrada que proscribía el placer e identificaba el sexo con el pecado.
Ha sido una larguísima y durísima batalla la que hubieron de librar los espíritus lúcidos contra los resortes más oscurantistas de la religión; fueron siglos de reinado absoluto del tabú del sexo, impuesto por los preceptos de una mal entendida moral judeocristiana que incluía, necesariamente además, una visión de la mujer que la relegaba a un segundo plano y la identificaba con el demonio.
El placer carnal, el disfrute del cuerpo, habían sido cuidadosamente categorizados como pecado, y la sexualidad sólo se justificaba en la medida que se practicaba con el único fin "natural" que no era otro que la reproducción.
Ese postulado, por absurdo que parezca, tuvo sin embargo el poder de trascender la esfera de lo religioso para ser aceptado sin mayores reparos por la sociedad toda, incluidos los ateos.
Hoy ese tabú absurdo se ha desmoronado y sólo sobrevive en sectores eclesiásticos particularmente conservadores. Son sectores con un poder aún sólido, capaces de ejercer su nefasta influencia sobre religiosos laicos. Sin embargo, debemos saludar la independencia de criterio exhibida por las autoridades del Círculo Católico, una mutualista con fuertes vínculos con la curia, pero que ha sabido hacer frente a los desesperados embates de las altas jerarquías y ha aceptado contar con su clínica de salud sexual, tal como lo manda la ley.

description.hltext_display: Тест на уречність
Creative Business Names
description.content:
It is very important
for any business that is looking to gain exposure by creating their product or service and name to acquire their very own identity. Creative business names for any businessmay lead to nicely thought out slogans and will improve the chance of reaching a crowd. The creation of an innovative business name may guide a company to make a logo design, that will helpan organization achieve corporate identity. It is sometimes extremely expensive and time consuming for any business to come up with innovative business names that fit their purposes. Bringing the hassles not to mention delays right out of the situation may be a little of a time consuming work if a creative business name is not resolved upon. Some companies online have a reputation of providing services which can help corporations develop a creative name for their business. Most of these firms that assist produce imaginativenames evaluate a business and also the brand to create creative business names to assist market and develop services or products for that business. Strategy and positioning is also essential,given it will figure out what type of audience pays attention to a particular business and their merchandise or solutions. Creating a business slogan and marketing strategy can be another requirement that lots of businesses have. Without a creative business name for a business is going to be literally difficult for someone to come up with an innovative business slogan that can help business find their market and stand out among other companies that are just using space. Each time a business or organization is looking to think of a innovative name for the things they're doing it's going to be essential that they have a creative team available to them. They should be competent to call on the creative team so that concepts can be made to assist the business be noticeable among other businesses. The creative design team must be able to stand by their word and come up with concepts in a reasonable amount of time. Creating a business name which usually relates to the item or services that are being offered can help the items or servicesmarket by themselves

description.hltext_display: Euro falls to record low versus Swiss franc
description.content:
Share on Facebook
LONDON Dec 22 (Reuters) - The euro fell to a record low versus the Swiss franc on Wednesday as worries over euro zone debt drove investors to the relative safety of the Swiss franc, triggering reported stop-loss orders.
The euro EURCHF= fell to 1.2511 francs per euro on trading platform EBS after stops were hit through 1.2520. Traders highlighted option barriers at 1.2500, with further stops at 1.2470.
The Swiss franc also rose to a two-month high versus the dollar CHF= of 0.9523 francs per dollar.

description.hltext_display: “世界最难”宜万铁路通车 最后240米耗时1年
description.author: news@rednet.cn
description.content:
今日，被业界称为“桥隧博物馆”的宜昌至万州I级电气化干线铁路开始运营。通车后，武汉到重庆约需8个小时，比现在少10小时。
该铁路投资225.7亿，长377公里，被称为“世界最难修的铁路”。“太难修了。”接受华西都市报记者采访时，中铁第四勘察设计院集团有限公司副总工刘坡拉说。
事实上，这条路101年前就开建了，前身是詹天佑主持修建的川汉铁路。 历史
前身为川汉铁路詹天佑曾主持施工
据介绍，1903年7月，一封来自四川的奏折曾摆在了满清王朝光绪皇帝的案头。
奏折由时任四川总督锡良拟就。此前，锡良曾由直隶正定府来四川赴任，行抵宜昌后舍舟而陆，对入川路途的险恶感触极深。在奏折里，锡良奏请朝廷批准川人自筹资金修建川汉铁路。
在经过一番筹资后，1908年，曾主持修建京张铁路的詹天佑受命担任川汉铁路宜万段总工程师。第二年，詹到宜昌勘定线路，决定先修宜昌至秭归一段铁路，这成了宜万铁路的前身。
詹天佑从粤汉、京张等铁路线调集6000多员工，整个线上工人最多时达4万多人。然而，即使詹天佑率领数万工人，以“艰苦卓绝，百折不挠”的精神组织施工，这条铁路最终还是没能完工――1911年初，清政府宣布取消商办铁路，川汉铁路在修建不到两年内，迅速夭折。
在此后数十年间，关于这条铁路，不同年代的工程师都曾进行过系统研究甚至小范围尝试修建，但均无疾而终。1997年开始，经过多次研究、勘察、论证，于2001年12月
完成宜万铁路预可行性研究报告。2004年1月，国家发展和改革委员会以发改投资［2004］75号文正式批准开工建设。受长江三峡蓄水影响，宜万铁路万州长江大桥于2002年底已先期开工建设。
讲述
确实太难修了5万多人修了7年
从1996年勘测铁路路线，到今年8月18日，宜万铁路铺下最后一段铁轨，刘坡拉一直在这条路线工作。他没有想到，自己在这条铁路上会干14年。
“勘测路线7年，修铁路用了7年。”他说。在进行路线勘测时，他一般早上五六点起床，上山调查断面、岩溶等情况，设计勘定路线，晚7点回来以后，整理当天的材料。“一般要到晚上10点，也经常整理到凌晨1点多。”
这条铁路投资225.7亿元，路段造价创下中国之最，平均每公里耗资约6000万元，而青藏铁路平均每公里只花2900万元。即使在投入如此庞大资金的基础上，铁路仍修得极其缓慢：5万多人修了7年，比青藏铁路、武广高铁耗时还长，是中国修建最慢的铁路。
“最大的原因是，这条铁路确实太难修了。”刘坡拉对华西都市报记者说，铁路经过的绝大部分地域是喀斯特地貌山区，遍布岩溶、暗河等不良地质，拥有世界上最复杂的地质条件。“在岩溶水作用下，岩石稳定性极差，形成充水的溶腔。这些溶腔一旦透水，后果不堪设想。”
在宜万铁路377公里的总长中，桥梁和隧道总长就占到了278公里，占所有路段的74%。铁路共有隧道159座，70%位于石灰岩地区，其中还有34座高风险的岩溶隧道。
回忆
遭遇“巨型蜂窝煤”最后240米挖了一年
位于鄂渝交界的齐岳山隧道，给刘坡拉留下了深刻印象。
这条隧道全长10.5公里，坐火车经过只要6分钟，但完全贯通却用了6年，甚至在隧道只剩下最后240米时，施工队还整整奋战了一年。
这是中国铁路史上最慢的记录。这条隧道通过15条断层、3条暗河，溶腔138个。“隧道内有一条长200多米的富水大断层，断层由角砾岩和断层泥组成，一挖就破，山体里的水像箭一样喷射出来。在强大水压下，水甚至能喷100层楼那么高。”刘坡拉说，“就像一个巨型充水的蜂窝煤。”刘坡拉比喻说，“一旦不小心遭遇突水，后果不堪设想。”
刘坡拉认为，用7年时间修建总共377公里的宜万铁路，这个速度“不算慢”。“在国外，要想在如此复杂地质条件下修这样一条路，至少要10年以上。我们用了7年，因为我们劳动力资源更充沛，可以调集到更多人手来参与这项工作。”
去年12月10日，这条宜万铁路上最难的隧道贯通，铁道部部长刘志军还专程前来祝贺。
建成
时速分快慢下月开行至成都列车
今年8月18日，宜万铁路铺下最后一段铁轨，全线贯通。在经过几个月电气化改造和列车测试后，这条铁路今日正式开始运营。
据了解，宜万铁路宜昌东至凉雾段288公里一次建成复线，设计时速160公里，最高可达200公里；凉雾至万州段89公里为单线，设计时速120公里。
今后，动车组也将在这条铁路上运行。“明年汉宜高速铁路通车后，这条线基本上是运行动车组。”刘坡拉说。目前，武汉列车经长荆线到宜昌，经宜万线进入万州至达州铁路，再进入成都、重庆，比现在运营压缩10个小时；今后连接在建的汉宜城际铁路、渝利铁路，武汉列车5小时内抵达成都、重庆。
武汉铁路局公布宜万铁路第一期时刻表显示，率先开通的5趟列车中，并没有从宜昌到成都的列车。在明年1月11日新增的9对列车中，将出现成都―宜昌东和成都至杭州的列车。华西都市报记者胡挺
延伸阅读
宜万铁路将增9对列车
明年1月11日起，宜万铁路将再增9对列车：
广州―达州K1096/7、K1098/5次，经由京广、沪昆、焦柳、宜万线。
成都―宜昌东K1196/5次，经由达成、达万、宜万线。
成都―杭州K530/1/0K529/32/29次，经由达成、达万、宜万、长荆、武九、京九、沪昆线。
[稿源：华西都市报]
[编辑：蔡娟]

description.hltext_display: Tv: piccole emittenti in guerra contro il governo (MF)
description.content:
MILANO (MF-DJ)--Ô guerra tra le tv locali e il governo. Tenuto sotto silenzio nei primi mesi dell'avvio del tv digitale terrestre, il confronto tra i giganti televisivi e i piccoli editori esplodera' in tutta la sua forza appena finite le festivita'.
L'annuncio, si legge in un articolo di MF, e' di Maurizio Giunco, presidente delle tv locali, della Frt, la federazione che raduna le emittenti locali italiane, che temono di sparire quando verra' ultimato lo switch-off dal segnale analogico a quello digitale. "Fino a oggi pensavamo che la legge Gasparri avesse effettivamente contribuito ad ampliare il pluralismo e la liberalizzazione dell'etere", ha detto Giunco a MF-Milano Finanza, "ma da un po' di tempo il clima e' cambiato e con la Legge di stabilita' il governo ha deciso che le tv locali non potranno piu' ospitare fornitori di contenuti nazionali, mentre allo stesso tempo verranno costrette a cedere frequenze per permettere al governo di indire la gara tra gli operatori telefonici". red/alb alberto.chimenti@mfdowjones.it
(END) Dow Jones Newswires
Copyright (c) 2010 MF-Dow Jones News Srl.

description.hltext_display: [고려대]이기수 총장, 한일법학회 제 4대 회장으로 선출
description.content: 이기수 고려대 총장이 최근 열린 한일법학회 이사회에서 제 4대 한일법학회 회장으로 선출됐다. 이기수 신임 회장은 2011년부터 2년간의 임기를 수행한다. 한일법학회는 한국과 일본 간 법학교류 및 학술증진을 위해 한-일 법학자들로 구성된 학회로, 2005년 출범했다.나소민/인터넷 경향신문 대학생기자 (웹場 baram.khan.co.kr)- ⓒ 경향신문 & 경향닷컴(www.khan.co.kr), 무단전재 및 재배포 금지〈경향닷컴은 한국온라인신문협회(www.kona.or.kr)의 디지털뉴스이용규칙에 따른 저작권을 행사합니다.〉

description.hltext_display: 傅穎聲稱與同事羅仲謙關係好
Verizon, attorney general agree to improve rural customers’ service
Бензинова лихоманка
CD v Otago Twenty20 match abandoned
description.content:
Heavy rain in Taranaki this week has forced the abandonment of tonight's domestic Twenty20 cricket championship match between Central Districts and Otago at Pukekura Park in New Plymouth.
Both teams pick up two points, which is unhelpful to Central Districts' hopes of pushing their way into the January 2 final.
They move up to third on 14 points, ahead of Wellington on net run rate, but would have been eyeing the maximum four points against bottom-placed Otago, who have now had three washed out matches.
Auckland lead the competition on 24 points, six ahead of second-placed Northern Districts.

description.hltext_display: 50 Cent's mansion broken into
description.content:
50 Cent's home has been broken into. According to gossip website TMZ, the two suspects entered through an unlocked door and were in possession of marijuana when police arrived to the home.
Both men were arrested and have been held on $50,000 bond. While the 'Candy Shop' hitmaker is the owner of a huge 52-bedroom mansion, earlier this year he revealed he doesn't think his $400 million fortune is enough.
The rapper said his troubled upbringing made him believe that having a lot of money would solve all his problems, and even though he no longer thinks that is the case, he always strives to do better. He said: "$400 million? I'm not sure how much I have, but that sounds great. I don't really think it'll ever be enough. I used to equate success with my finances because I didn't have anything, and when you don't have any money, it seems money is the answer to all your problems. Then you get money, and you've got a whole new set of problems."

description.hltext_display: Etçil Restaurant göz kamaştırıyor
description.content:
İşletme sahipleri Ender Tekşan ve Serdar Çalık, gittikleri restaurantlarda fiyatları beğenmeyince Etçil Restaurant’ı hizmete sunmuşlar
Cemalpaşa Mahallesi 63012 Sokak’ta (Eski Radyoevi Sokağı’nda) hizmet veren Etçil Restaurant’a yolu düşenler, bu mekanın müdavimi oluyor. Enişte ve kayınbirader olan işletme sahipleri Ender Tekşan ve Serdar Çalık, 5 ay önce açtıkları Etçil Restaurant’ta tüm et yemeklerinin yanı sıra, zengin tatlı çeşitleriyle de müşterilerinin damak tadına hitap ettiklerini dile getirdiler.
Gerek konuklarıyla gerek tek başlarına gittikleri restaurantlarda fiyatlardan memnun kalmamaları üzerine, Etçil Restaurant’ı açmaya karar verdiklerine dikkat çeken Ender Tekşan ve Serdar Çalık, “Kayınbirader-enişte olarak en iyisi bu işi kendimiz yapalım dedik. İyisiyle, güzeliyle başaracağımıza inanıyorduk. Ve öyle de oldu. Etçil Restaurant şu anda hem kalitesi hem de gelecek müşterilerinin hesap konusunda hiç tereddüt etmeyeceği bir mekan özelliği taşıyor” şeklinde, işletmenin kuruluş hikayesini özetlediler.
65 kişilik salonu ve bahçesiyle birlikte toplam 120 kişiye hizmet verebildiklerini kaydeden Ender Tekşan ve Serdar Çalık, işletmelerinde şu anda Türk mutfağına hakim bir ustanın çalıştığını belirttiler. Tekşan ve Çalık, menülerinde bir hayli yöresel ve ulusal lezzeti bir arada sunduklarını dile getirerek, el kıyması Adana kebabı, beyti sarma, Alinazik, fıstıklı kebap, küşneme ve saç tava gibi daha birçok et yemeklerinin en iyisini sunduklarını belirttiler.
Etçil Restaurant’ta ayrıca kendilerine özgü kızarmış dondurma ve zengin tatlı çeşitlerini de müşterilerinin damak zevkine uygun hazırlandığını kaydeden Tekşan ve Çalık, kendi zeytin bahçeleri olduğu için yemeklerinde kullandıkları zeytinyağını da yine kendi bahçelerinden özel olarak hazırladıklarını söylediler.
ŞEHİR İÇİNDE AYRI BİR DÜNYA
Etçil Restaurant, şehir içinde apayrı bir dünyayı andırıyor. Göz kamaştıran iç dizaynı, doğal ortamı andıran bahçesiyle, insanların ailesiyle, özel ağırladıkları konukları ve dostlarıyla, nezih bir ortamda yemek yiyip, hoşça zaman geçirecekleri ender mekanların başında geliyor. Kentin her yerinden en kısa zamanda ulaşılabilecek olması Etçil Restaurant’a büyük avantajlarından birisini oluştururken, müşterilerinin araçlarını da güvenli bir şekilde park edebilecekleri bir otoparkın bulunması, Etçil Restaurant’ın müdavimleri tarafından beğenilen bir hizmet anlayışı şeklinde değerlendiriliyor.
Etçil Restaurant, disiplinli, hijyene önem veren ustabaşından komisine kadar kendi alanında isim yapmış bir kadroya sahip. Etçil Restaurant’a gelen her müşteri, güleryüzlü personelle karşılanırken, uğurlanırken de aynı ihtimamı görüyor.
Etçil Restaurant’ın işletme ortakları Tekşan ve Çalık, her müşterinin, buraya gelmekten büyük zevk aldıklarını belirterek, “Etçil Restaurant, Adana kent merkezinde adeta ayrı bir dünya. Kent içinde böyle bir mekanın bulunması çoluk çocuklarımızla olduğu kadar kentiçi ve kent dışından ağırladığımız konuklarımız karşısında yüzümüzü ağartan bir restaurant” diye görüşlerini dile getiriyorlar.
İşletme ortaklarından İnşaat Mühendisi Serdar Çalık, aynı zamanda Çalık Dekor’un da sahibi. Kayınbiraderi Ender Tekşan ise turizm işletme mezunu ve Koç Grubu’na bağlı birçok otellerde deneyim kazanmış bir isim.
İsteyen müşteriler, facebook ve yemeksepeticom. sitesinden Etçil Restauran’ta sipariş verebilir.

description.hltext_display: Jos Germn
description.content:
Hay uruguayos que nunca hemos estado en las mismas trincheras. Hay otros con los cuales la vida nos ha llevado a encontrarnos y desencontrarnos fruto de las vicisitudes de la vida, personal y política. Ya con algunos años de experiencia encima, tengo la sensación de que cuando lo que se ha compartido es la lucha por una causa justa, la vida casi siempre da la oportunidad del reencuentro.
Y a veces, no la da. Yo no tengo duda de que si José Germán Araújo hubiera vivido hubiera habido un momento para el reencuentro. Creo que no se trata de ver quién tiró más de la piolita...que poco importa saberlo. El tenía un carácter difícil. Y yo...Dios me perdone. Pero lo que nos unió fue muy fuerte. No puedo hablar por él. Pero por mí, tengo necesidad de hacerlo.
Hubo un Uruguay en el que habló por todos los que no podíamos hablar. Este año se cumplieron 30 años de la fundación de la Convergencia Democrática. Antes de declarar en un reciente caso de investigación judicial sobre la suerte de un desaparecido (Julio Castro), revisando papeles, no podía creer las cosas que la prensa obsecuente con la dictadura dijo de nosotros. El fue nuestra voz y en Uruguay se sabía de nuestra lucha por su micrófono y su radio.
Hace treinta años del plebiscito... No se puede recordarlo borrando de la Historia la figura de Araújo. Hace 34 años que nos juntamos con él, Diego Achard y mi padre Wilson, en Bogotá. Cenamos juntos. Solo yo quedo vivo de aquella velada llena de esperanza y compromisos. Nos acompañó en el barco en nuestro regreso a Uruguay el 16 de junio del 84.
Ya no tengo la chance de darle un abrazo y superar nuestras diferencias. Pero sí tengo la oportunidad de cumplir con mi necesidad y deber de decir lo que siento.

description.hltext_display: Famed Comic Artist Joe Benitez Teaches the Art of Seduction
description.content:
Hollywood, Calif.—The Gnomon Workshop, an industry leader in professional training for artists in the entertainment and design field, recently released a new DVD on portraying the seductive female form, taught by renowned comic book artist Joe Benitez.
The latest training DVD release from The Gnomon Workshop, "Comic Book Pin Ups with Joe Benitez: The Art of Sex Appeal through Pose and Expression," features instruction from the celebrated American comic book artist. In the tutorials, Benitez, who has worked on titles from leading publishers like DC Comics and Image, discusses the art of capturing the allure and sex appeal of comic book heroines while showcasing a variety of his unique illustration methods. Utilizing his distinct experience in capturing the tempting heroine with the perfect pose and expression, Benitez teaches aspiring artists how he conveys mood and emotion with a few well-placed pencil strokes.
Benitez is currently working on a new creator-owned series, "Lady Mechanika," published by Aspen Comics.
In the past, Benitez has worked on top DC Comics titles such as "Justice League of America," "Superman/Batman," "Detective Comics," "Supergirl," and "Titans." He also co-created and penciled the sci-fi series "Weapon Zero" and the dark fantasy mini-series "Magdalena: Blood Divine" for Image. In 2005, Joe published his first creator-owned mini-series "Wraithborn" through Wildstorm, and in 2009, he stepped in to finish up Michael Turner's run on "Soulfire."
DVD Description:
In "Comic Book Pin Ups with Joe Benitez: The Art of Sex Appeal through Pose and Expression," Benitez unveils the secrets of drawing alluring comic book style pin-up characters. Sex appeal and allure is conveyed through several methods including stylized proportions, foreshortening, twists and curves. The importance of facial expression is also discussed in the context of conveying the right mood or emotion, and bringing it all together for a consistent, captivating character.

event_or_fact.property: mood and emotion with a few well-placed pencil strokes

description.hltext_display: 我国施工难度最大的山区铁路“宜万铁路”正式通车
description.author: news@rednet.cn
description.content:
新华社快讯：２２日１０时１８分，４８０６次列车从湖北恩施火车站首发，这标志着 。
相关报道：
“世界最难”宜万铁路通车 最后240米耗时1年
12月19日，一辆检测车通过宜万铁路湖北恩施清江特大桥。12月22日，我国建设难度最大的山区铁路宜万铁路将正式通车。运营初期，宜万铁路将开行旅客列车5对，2011年1月11日起将开行14对。新华社发（田代明 摄）
铁道部结束对宜万铁路为期3天的安全评估工作
新华社宜昌１１月２８日电（记者 田建军 冯国栋）２８日，铁道部评估组结束了对宜万铁路为期３天的安全评估工作。这也是宜万铁路通车前的最后一次大规模评估。目前，开通车前的各项准备工作已在全线展开。
由工务、信号、供电等方面专家组成的铁道部评估组于２５日至２８日现场检查了宜万铁路沿途站点和安全防护措施。对于评估组检查发现的问题，武汉铁路局、成都铁路局和宜万铁路各施工单位按照“解决问题不过夜”的原则，组织精干力量进行整治和强补，确保把隐患全部消除在铁路开通运营之前。 阅读
宜万铁路结束为期一周的试运行即将迎来全线通车 新华社宜昌１１月２４日电 ２４日下午，最后一辆试运行货物列车缓缓驶进宜昌东站，标志着宜万铁路结束了为期一周的试运行。铁道部评估组将从２５日开始展开全线安全评估。若评估顺利，历时７年建设的宜万铁路将迎来全线通车。
宜万铁路从１７日开始试运行。试运行货运列车编组总重最高值为３５００吨。客运列车则由１８节编组组成，时速１６０公里。
[稿源：新华社]
[作者：阅读]
[编辑：蔡娟]

description.hltext_display: Governo: Frattini, stiamo mantenendo le promesse
description.content:
ROMA (MF-DJ)--"Quello che Berlusconi aveva promesso a settembre lo stiamo realizzando". A dirlo e' il ministro degli Esteri, Franco Frattini, intervenendo a Mattino 5.
Frattini ha infatti sottolineato che il Governo sta "sviluppando la riforma federale dello Stato, il ministro Alfano sta elaborando il quadro organico per la riforma della giustizia, ma procede anche il piano per il Sud". Il ministro ha poi ricondato anche che in previsione c'e' "anche la riforma fiscale" per la quale e' gia' stato avviato dialogo con le parti sociali.
In merito all'apertura al Governo del leader dell'Udc, Pierferdinando Casini, Frattini ritiene che "si vedra' in Parlamanto, ma finora c'e' stato atteggiamento costruttivo". Sull'ipotesi di elezioni anticipate, infine, il ministro ha ribadtito che "porterebbero verso un quadro di instabilita'" sottolineando comunque che non servono dato che "abbiamo dimostrato che abbiamo la maggioranza". red/fra
(END) Dow Jones Newswires

description.hltext_display: Business Name Ideas That Will Aid Your Garden Grow!
description.content: William Shakespeare previously said, "What's in the name? That which we call a rose by any other name would smell as sweet." These kinds of logic are not to be applied for all thoseattempting to create a business title concept. In case you're in the business of roses, then this business name that you put together as the idea to your company need to feature the word, "rose."How can everyone know what it is you'll want to offer when you forget to use "rose" within your business name? Your business title should come up with a declaration concerning your products or services. It should easily be searched by your clients or potential clients who may be in need of what you have to offer. One example is, should you have a new product for cleaning shoes, and then in the business name you should propose two key words: cleaning and shoes. Or else, your prospective customerswill never determine what it is that you are offering. A perfect example would be "Soft-Touch Shoe Shining Cloth" because it describes the merchandise and also the goal. Similar reasoning is applicable when attempting to come up with a good idea for any business name that has a service. Should your company offers childcare you would then never choose aname that doesn't suggest childcare services, as an example, "Mary's Miracle Workers." Exactly what the "miracles" that Mary's personnel perform? It could keep the possible clientsscratching their heads and also thinking if Mary carries a divine correlation. There needs to be clarity regarding the title of the business and also the service or product they are giving. Picking a business name and coming up with fantastic and appealing ideas for names is something. Permitting the shoppers to clearly recognize precisely what goods and services you are offering will be the only thing you should be worried about any time thinking over business name concepts.

event_or_fact.property: What's in the name?; That which we call a rose by any other name would smell as sweet.

description.hltext_display: Weihnachtsgrüße vom Verband der Südtiroler in Vorarlberg =
description.content: Bregenz (OTS/VLK) - Der Vorstand des Verbandes der Südtiroler in Vorarlberg überbrachte auch heuer wieder im Landhaus in Bregenz Weihnachtsgrüße. Die Abordnung wurde von Landeshauptmann Herbert Sausgruber begrüßt. 2011 wird der Verband sein 65-jähriges Bestehen feiern. Der Landeshauptmann bedankte sich für das vielfältige Engagement, das die vielen freiwilligen tätigen Mitglieder im Dienste des guten Miteinanders in der Vorarlberger Gesellschaft erbringen. Der Verband der Südtiroler in Vorarlberg wurde im August 1946 gegründet, mit dem Ziel, Südtiroler Brauchtum sowie Tradition und Wurzeln zu bewahren. Für die nach Vorarlberg zugewanderten Menschen sollte der Verband eine Brücke zur alten Heimat werden. Heute verkörpert die Vereinigung, insbesondere aufgrund der zahlreichen gesellschaftlichen und kulturellen Aktivitäten, einen lebendigen Teil Südtirols in unserem Land. Durch die intensive Mitgliederbetreuung, den Kontakt mit anderen Verbänden und Vereinen und durch die Mitarbeit im Interkulturellen Komitee leistet der Verband einen wichtigen Beitrag zur Integration und zur kulturellen Verständigung in Vorarlberg, betonte Sausgruber abschließend. Rückfragehinweis: ~ Landespressestelle Vorarlberg Tel.: 05574/511-20137, Fax: 05574/511-20190 presse@vorarlberg.at http://www.vorarlberg.at/presse Hotline: 0664/625 56 68, 625 56 67 ~ *** OTS-ORIGINALTEXT PRESSEAUSSENDUNG UNTER AUSSCHLIESSLICHER INHALTLICHER VERANTWORTUNG DES AUSSENDERS - WWW.OTS.AT *** OTS0009 2010-12-22/08:28 220828 Dez 10 NVL0001 0175

description.hltext_display: Dank an gute Geister des Zimmermann-Stifts
description.content:
Weihnachtsfeier für Mitarbeiter, Bewohner und Ehrenamtliche
Die betagten Bewohner des Dr.-Zimmermann-Stiftes erlebten eine besinnliche Weihnachtsfeier mit Kaffee und Kuchen und viel Musik.
Meersburg (mü) Die Weihnachtsfeier im Dr.-Zimmermann-Stift in der Kur allee wird von den Bewohnern jedes Jahr besonders sehnsüchtig erwartet. Die Helfer und Helferinnen, die Therapeuten, die Zivildienstleistenden, die Schülerinnen für das Projekt „Junioren für Senioren“ und natürlich das Küchenteam hatten viele Vorbereitungen getroffen, um ein weihnachtliches Fest mit viel Flair zu schaffen.
Liebevoll war der Essenssaal geschmückt. Die Säulen umrankte Tannengrün, der Weihnachtsbaum glitzerte und auch die langen Tafeln waren weihnachtlich dekoriert – dazu der Schnee auf der Terrasse und auf den Bäumen. Das Team in der Küche sorgte für leckeren Kuchen und später für Weißwurst und Kartoffelsalat.
In dieser festlichen Atmosphäre war es Spitalverwalter Peter Kemmer und Bürgermeister Martin Brütsch ein Anliegen, den guten ehrenamtlichen Geistern, den Helfern und „Grünen Damen“ für ihre unentgeltliche Hilfe mit einem kleinen Geschenk zu danken (wir berichteten). Die rührigen Damen und Herren, ohne deren Hilfe mancher Spaziergang ausfiele und manches Lied nicht gesungen würde, würdigte Spitalverwalter Peter Kemmer mit anerkennenden Worten.
Karin Kienzler sagte ein volles weihnachtliches Programm an. Alle Bewohner sangen die alten Weihnachtslieder, frischen Wind brachten die Kinder der Jugendmusikschule Meersburg mit ihrem rührenden Flötenspiel unter Leitung von Marianne Frank in den Saal. Auch der Seniorleiter des Fiorini-Orchesters, Arno Fiorini, stellt sich gern mit seiner Gitarre in den Dienst der guten Sache. „Hit“ ist der „Andachtsjodler“, mit dem er und Karin Kienzler die Senioren bezaubern.

description.hltext_display: Savcılığın son hamlesi, BDP'ye kapatma davasının ilk adımı mı?
description.content:
Demokratik Toplum Kongresi (DTK) ile BDP’nin gerçekleştirdiği Demokratik Özerklik Çalıştayı’nda tartışmaya açılan ‘özerklik modeli’ konusunda TBMM Başkanı Şahin’in de göreve çağırdığı Yargıtay Cumhuriyet Başsavcılığı dün ses verdi. Başsavcılık, DTK’nın bir siyasi parti ile bağı bulunup bulunmadığı konusunda inceleme başlattı. Diyarbakır Başsavcılığı da DTK toplantısına inceleme başlattı.
Yargıtay Başsavcılığı’nın dün internet sitesinden yaptığı açıklamada “Diyarbakır Başsavcılığı’ndan bu konuda bir inceleme var ise evrakın bir örneğinin, valilikten de toplantı ile ilgili idari bir işlem yapılıp yapılmadığı ve taslağın bir örneğinin gönderilmesi istenilmiş, DTK ile herhangi bir siyasi parti arasında organik bir bağ olup olmadığı hususu incelemeye alınmıştır” denildi.
İnceleme Siyasi Partiler Yasası’nın ‘Demokratik devlet düzeninin korunması’, ‘Devletin tekliği ilkesinin korunması’, ‘Azınlık yaratılmasının önlenmesi’, ‘Bölgecilik ve ırkçılık yasağı’ ile ‘Siyasi partilerin kapatılması’na ilişkin maddeleri kapsamında yapılıyor.
Yönlendirilme iddiası kınandı
Yargıtay Başsavcılığı, ÇYDD’nin 2008’de parti kapatma konusunda baskı yaptığı yönündeki haberleri bir açıklamayla kınadı. ÇYDD’nin randevu talebine karşı nezaket gereği bir görüşme yapıldığı belirtilen açıklamada, “Görüşmeye farklı bir anlam yükleme gayretleri dikkat çekici” denildi.

description.hltext_display: Japan may halve time for rights issues -sources
description.content:
TOKYO, Dec 22 (Reuters) - Japan may halve the procedure time for companies to raise funds through rights issues to make it easier for corporations to raise capital from existing shareholders, sources familiar with the matter said.
Rights issues, in which all existing shareholders are given an option to buy newly issued shares, have rarely been used in Japan because it can take as long as three months to process applications.
The government is considering making changes to laws and rules governing rights issue to shorten fund-raising to about a month and half, said two sources, who declined to be identified because they were not authorised to talk about the matter publicly.
(Reporting by Noriyuki Hirata, editing by Taiga Uranaka and Tim Kelly; Editing by Michael Watson)
((taiga.uranaka@thomsonreuters.com; +81-3-6441-1813; Reuters Messaging: taiga.uranaka.reuters.com@reuters.net)) Keywords: JAPAN/RIGHTS ISSUES

description.hltext_display: Atalantia: Abertis progetta di vendere partecipazione (Expansion)
description.content:
MILANO (MF-DJ)--Abertis sta progettando di vendere la sua partecipazione in Atlantia e nella portoghese Brisa per finanziare i suoi investimenti futuri.
Abertis, si legge nell'edizione online di Expansion, detiene una partecipazione del 6,7% in Atlantia e una quota pari al 14,58% in Brisa. La partecipazione della societa' spagnola in Atlantia era valutata lunedi' 607,5 mln euro, mentre quella in Brisa 471 mln. red/est/alb alberto.chimenti@mfdowjones.it

description.hltext_display: Bezirksmuseum 22: Weihnachtsschau am 24. Dezember ansehen =
description.content: Wien (OTS) - Seit Ende November präsentiert das Bezirksmuseum Donaustadt eine gefällige "Weihnachtsausstellung". Die Schau hat den Titel "Weihnachtliches - Krippen und Wachszieher" und beinhaltet Krippen in mehreren Stilrichtungen und Materialien sowie ländliche Schmuckgegenstände und manch andere Werke von Wachsziehern. Die Museumsräume im "Alten Feuerwehrhaus" (22., Kagraner Platz 53/54) sind am Freitag, 24. Dezember, von 10.00 bis 14.00 Uhr geöffnet. Ehrenamtlich tätige Museumsmitarbeiter erklären den Besuchern die Besonderheiten der Exponate. Darüber hinaus beantworten die Bezirkshistoriker gerne Fragen über die Vergangenheit der Donaustadt und führen das Publikum durch eine Dauer-Ausstellung zu dieser interessanten Thematik. Der Zutritt ist kostenlos. Zwtl.: E-Mails an das Museum: bezirksmuseumdonaustadt@aon.at Komplettiert wird die nett arrangierte "Weihnachtsausstellung" durch einige Lebzelter-Waren, zum Beispiel ein Lebkuchen-Haus. Private Sammler haben dem Museumsteam die Schaustücke leihweise überlassen. Nach dem Weihnachtstag bleibt das Museum kurzzeitig geschlossen. Von Samstag, 25. Dezember, bis Samstag, 8. Jänner, ist das "Alte Feuerwehrhaus" nicht zugänglich. Hernach gelten wieder die gewohnten Öffnungszeiten (Sonntag: 10.00 bis 12.00 Uhr, Mittwoch: 17.00 bis 19.00 Uhr, Eintritt frei). Auskünfte gibt die Museumsmannschaft unter der Rufnummer 203 21 26 (tlw. Anrufbeantworter) oder per E-Mail. Zuschriften sind an die E-Mail-Adresse bezirksmuseumdonaustadt@aon.at zu richten. ~ o Allgemeine Informationen: Bezirksmuseum Donaustadt: www.bezirksmuseum.at ~ (Schluss) enz Rückfragehinweis: PID-Rathauskorrespondenz: www.wien.gv.at/rk/ Oskar Enzfelder Presse- und Informationsdienst der Stadt Wien (MA 53) Telefon: 01 4000-81057 E-Mail: oskar.enzfelder@wien.gv.at *** OTS-ORIGINALTEXT PRESSEAUSSENDUNG UNTER AUSSCHLIESSLICHER INHALTLICHER VERANTWORTUNG DES AUSSENDERS - WWW.OTS.AT *** OTS0019 2010-12-22/09:02 220902 Dez 10 NRK0004 0222

description.hltext_display: The Use of Business Name Generator
description.content: If you are a business owner dedicated to big concepts, certainly not on the details, consider using a business name generator. It might be a cliché, but first opinions are lasting opinions. Just before your company would make the ranks in the Fortune 500, the general public has to know its name. It's easy to recognize the significance of a business name if you think it as being your child. In many ways it operates in that way. You develop a business out of absolutely nothing, provide for it, cultivate its' growth, get credit for its successes and tend to be in charge of its' disappointments. With effort, several nights without sleep as well as good fortune, it works on its own and possibly leaves the nest in a profitable stock acquisition. But before your baby brings together all your hopes and dreams, you must give it a name. And that's exactly when a top qualitybusiness name generator comes to play. Think as a extremely pleased parent whenever approaching naming your small business. Parents-to-be realize the name they give will hold with their youngster all through what they wish will be a lengthy and important life. From the outset they will envision their little bunch as a, physician, lawyer or attorney or designer, deciding on a name that suits the lifestyle. Parents take onmonths thinking about the name, choosing the ideal formula signifying the child's ability. Countless child textbooks are obtained and hours of online research are performed hunting for a namethat works well from childhood to the adult years. Parents check out to ensure the name isn't overused, also enquiring family and friend on names that make the short list. Names are applied to find out the way it rolls from the tongue and quite a few spellings tested before you make the big announcement. Therefore, why can you not do the same for the name that may symbolize your business for the rest of it's' life? Just before anybody steps foot in a place of business or signs on to a website they digest the company's name. Commit your efforts and resources to find a name that is definitely unique from the opposition, but approachable for the business. Develop a business name that works through the business inception and leaves space for growth. A business name generator helps with these critical steps. Handle your new baby similar to a prideful parent and give your business name the attention it should get.

description.hltext_display: В Києві зібрали іграшкових ведмежат з усієї країни
Radikal'in duyurduğu skandal sonrası, SGK gece tarifesini kapatıyor
description.content:
Radikal dünkü haberinde özel hastanelerin, SGK’lı hastalara gündüz ve gece uyguladığı farklı fiyat tarifesi ve sektörde bu uygulamanın hızla yayıldığını duyurmuştu. Gündüz vakti SGK’lı hasta için 20 lira olan muayene ücreti, gece tarifesinde 67 liraya yükseliyordu. Üstelik gece tarifesinin sadece muayeneyi değil testleri de kapsıyordu.
Haber üzerine harekete geçen SGK Genel Müdürlüğü, müfettiş görevlendirerek inceleme başlattı. SGK Genel Müdürlüğü’nden yapılan açıklama şöyle:
“Özel ve vakıf üniversite hastanelerinin, SGK’lı hastalardan belirlenen ilave ücret oranlarından daha yüksek ücret talep etmeleri kesinlikle yasaktır. Sigortalılarımızdan daha yüksek oranda ilave ücret talep edilmesinin tespiti halinde sözleşme hükümlerine göre cezai müeyyideler uygulanmakta, kurumumuza yapılan ihbar ve şikâyetler derhal değerlendirilerek konunun araştırılması yapılmaktadır.”

description.hltext_display: Leading Black Caps eye another hefty IPL pay day
description.content:
Leading Black Caps Daniel Vettori, Brendon McCullum and Ross Taylor look set for another massive payday from the IPL after being named among the 21 players with the highest reserve price of $US400,000 (NZ$538,864) for next years auction. The auction will be held in Bangalore on January 8 and 9.
They are among the biggest names in the game although there are some notable absentees - Australians Ricky Ponting, Michael Clarke and Mitchell Johnson wont be involved and once again the troubled Pakistan camp has been ignored.
The resurgent Johnson, who last week bowled Australia to victory in Perth, has elected to sit out the fourth edition of the IPL, which will start in April days after the World Cup, in a bid to prolong his international career.
''We want to manage his career so he can continue to play on at the elite level for six, seven, eight more years,'' Johnson's manager, Sam Halvorsen, said.
''We don't want him to be burnt out by overcooking himself. We don't see how that will be aided by playing too much cricket and playing IPL is too much cricket. It's also a long time from home, and they get precious little time at home.
''When he's not playing cricket he's working extremely hard in the gym to ensure his core strength is right where it needs to be to enable him to bowl the way he bowls.''
Johnson is said to be wary of missing out on international cricket as a result of getting injured in the event.
West Indies legend Brian Lara, whio hasn't played meaningful cricket for four years is among the group of new names along with current England stars Graeme Swann, Stuart Broad and James Anderson.
The franchises have $US9m to spend on their personnel.
There are 10 teams involved with 74 matches and the season looks set to go ahead despite the threat of court action.
The Indian organisers released a list of 416 players for the auction.
The players with the reserve price of $US400,000 are: Daniel Vettori, Brendon McCullum, Ross Taylor, Adam Gilchrist, Brett Lee, Shaun Marsh, James Anderson, Kevin Pietersen, Stuart Broad, Graeme Swann, Luke Wright, Michael Yardy, Rahul Dravid, Anil Kumble, Yuvraj Singh, Graeme Smith, AB de Villiers, Mahela Jayawardene, Tillakaratne Dilshan, Brian Lara, Chris Gayle.
Second Tier ($US300,000): Jacques Kallis, Muttiah Muralitharan, Zaheer Khan, Yusuf Pathan, Shaun Tait, Andrew Symonds, Angelo Mathews and Kumar Sangakkara
Third Tier ($US200,000): Sourav Ganguly, Gautam Gambhir, Michael Hussey, Doug Bollinger, Dirk Nannes, Eoin Morgan, Robin Uthappa, Sanath Jayasuriya, David Hussey.
-with Sydney Morning Herald

description.hltext_display: - Governo paulista quer destinar 25% dos leitos de hospitais públicos a planos de saúde
description.content:
Projeto de lei complementar apresentado em caráter de urgência pelo governo de São Paulo permite que hospitais públicos administrados por organizações sociais de saúde de todo o estado destinem até 25% de seus leitos para clientes de convênios particulares. A medida se aplica também aos serviços especializados de alta complexidade.
Encaminhado à Assembleia Legislativa no dia 29 de novembro, o projeto foi a plenário na última quinta-feira (16), ocasião em que recebeu 35 votos favoráveis e 17 contrários, mas não foi aprovado por falta do quórum. A previsão é que o projeto seja apreciado pelos deputados estaduais ainda hoje (21).
Na prática, a iniciativa pode autorizar os 20 hospitais estaduais, que são gerenciados por organizações do terceiro setor, a atender de forma diferenciada aos clientes de planos de saúde privados, cobrando o ressarcimento diretamente das operadoras de convênios. Em sua mensagem, o governador esclarece que a mudança só valerá para as unidades de saúde que prestem serviços de saúde especializado e de alta complexidade e que seja responsável por mais de 50% da oferta em sua região.
Segundo a Secretaria Estadual de Saúde, cerca de 40% da população paulista têm planos mas, ainda assim, recorrem a unidades públicas especializadas e de alta complexidade. Juntos, os 20 hospitais gastam R$ 468 milhões por ano com atendimento gratuito aos clientes de convênios. O novo projeto, justifica o governo, não só corrigiria essa “distorção” como criaria uma segunda fonte de financiamento aos hospitais públicos, o que garantiria o atendimento aos usuários do SUS.
Ainda segundo a secretaria estadual, a mudança visa a garantir que as unidades de saúde autorizadas a trabalhar em condições que ainda serão definidas possam cobrar o ressarcimento dos gastos de quem tem um plano de saúde particular. Em nota, a secretaria garante que não há, hoje, meios legais dos hospitais públicos cobrarem das empresas privadas o ressarcimento dos gastos.
Embora o governo estadual sustente que a iniciativa não significará uma restrição de atendimento ou uma diminuição do atual número de leitos destinados aos usuários do SUS, entidades como o Sindicato dos Trabalhadores Públicos da Saúde no Estado (SindSaúde) afirmam que o projeto significa a privatização do sistema criado para atender, indistinta e gratuitamente, a qualquer cidadão brasileiro.
“Somos totalmente contra o projeto porque entendemos que ele fere um dos principais princípios do SUS, que é a questão da universalidade, ou seja, atender a todo mundo igualitariamente. Na hora em que o projeto estipula um percentual para um tipo de atendimento, ele contraria esse princípio”, declarou Ângelo D´Agostini, diretor executivo do SindSaúde, para quem, se o projeto for aprovado, não haverá como o número de leitos para quem depende exclusivamente do atendimento gratuito não diminuir. “Vai haver menos leitos para as pessoas que dependem do SUS”.
Já o Sindicato dos Médicos de São Paulo (Simesp) entende que o projeto é inconstitucional. “A venda de leitos do SUS é proibida. Não há como se cobrar pelo atendimento em um estabelecimento público. Isso é totalmente irregular”, afirmou o presidente do sindicato, Cid Carvalhaes. Junto com outras organizações sociais, as duas entidades prometem lotar a Assembleia Legislativa, amanhã, para protestar e impedir que o projeto seja votado.
O Ministério Público de São Paulo concorda que o projeto é inconstitucional e promete ingressar com ação civil pública para impedir que, se aprovado, ele entre em vigor. “Um projeto desta relevância não pode ser votado em menos de um mês. Isso é uma violência contra a sociedade”, afirmou o promotor de Justiça da Promotoria de Direitos Humanos na Área de Saúde Pública, Arthur Pinto Filho. (ABr)

description.hltext_display: JM衛蘭齊拍廣告斜板擺甫士
[계명대]'희망을 꿈꾸는 연주회' 열어
description.content: · 계명대, 2009년부터 지역사회 서비스투자사업의 일환으로 ‘뮤직바이러스’사업 진행· ‘뮤직바이러스’정기발표회 통해 소외계층 아동의 성취감과 자존감 높이는 기회 제공· 보다 많은 지역의 아동들에게 보다 다양한 예능분야의 혜택을 주기 위해 지속적으로 노력계명대 대구지역사회서비스투자사업지원단(단장: 조성숙)은 올 4월부터 보건복지부, 대구광역시, 남구의 재정지원을 받아 소외계층 아동의 정서발달 지원사업인 ‘뮤직바이러스’교육서비스를 달서구에 이어 남구지역에도 제공하고 있으며, 지난 21일 계명대 평생교육원(대명캠퍼스)에서‘제1회 남구 뮤직바이러스 정기발표회(부제: 희망을 꿈꾸는 음악회)’를 개최하였다.대구지역 사회서비스 투자사업의 하나로 개발된 ‘뮤직바이러스’교육서비스는 달서구와 남구에 거주하는 소외계층 아동들에게 주 1회 전문음악교육(피아노, 성악)과 월 1회 정서함양서비스를 실시하고 연 2회 정기발표회를 개최함으로써 소외계층 아동들이 긍정적 정서를 함양하고 음악적 재능을 발굴, 계발할 수 있는 기회를 제공하는데 그 목적이 있다.‘뮤직바이러스’ 교육서비스는 음악을 전공한 석사 재학 혹은 석사학위 소지자들이 담당하며, 체계적이고 전문적인 음악교육을 위해 1:1 맞춤형 교육서비스를 제공하고 있다. 1인당 교육비용이 월 19만원이지만 정부에서 18만원을 지원하고 교육생은 1만원만 부담하면 된다. 현재 초등학생을 대상으로 피아노와 성악 교육을 운영하고 있으나 2011년부터는 초?중학생을 대상으로 바이올린 교육을 추가해 서비스 범위를 확대할 예정이며, 교육을 원하지만 계명대 성서, 대명캠퍼스와 접근성이 떨어지는 아동들을 위해 소속 학교와 연계해 해당학교에서 교육서비스를 제공받을 수 있도록 할 계획이다. 계명대 대구지역사회서비스투자사업지원단 조성숙 단장은“『뮤직바이러스』사업은 경제적 어려움으로 음악교육의 기회가 적은 아동들에게 음악적 재능을 계발하고 정서를 순화할 수 있는 기회를 제공할 뿐만 아니라, 음악 전공자들에게 새로운 취업 기회를 제공한다는 데 그 의의가 있다.”며, “이러한 서비스가 보다 많은 지역의 아동들과 보다 다양한 예능분야로 확대하기 위해 지속적으로 노력하겠다.”고 말했다.한편 계명대 대구지역사회서비스투자사업지원단은 2009년부터 보건복지부, 대구광역시, 달서구와 남구의 재정지원을 받아 달서구와 남구지역의 경제적 어려움이 있는 아동들을 대상으로‘뮤직바이러스’사업을 진행해 오고 있으며, 달서구에서는 현재 약 90명의 아동들이 계명대 음악?공연예술대학(성서캠퍼스)에서 교육을 받고 있으며, 올해부터 시작된 남구에서는 70여명의 아동들이 계명대 평생교육원(대명캠퍼스)에서 교육을 받고 있다.김정윤/인터넷 경향신문 대학생기자 (웹場 baram.khan.co.kr)- ⓒ 경향신문 & 경향닷컴(www.khan.co.kr), 무단전재 및 재배포 금지〈경향닷컴은 한국온라인신문협회(www.kona.or.kr)의 디지털뉴스이용규칙에 따른 저작권을 행사합니다.〉

description.hltext_display: - Orçamento 2011 deve ser votado amanhã
description.content:
A relatora do Projeto de Lei de Orçamento da União para 2011, senadora Serys Slhessarenko (PT-MT), disse ontem (20) que o documento final da peça orçamentária deve ser votado em plenário amanhã (22), último dia de trabalho do Congresso Nacional em 2010. Ela afirmou que a votação na Comissão Mista de Orçamento deve ocorrer hoje (21) às 17h.
“Há uma expectativa positiva que se vote na amanhã”, afirmou Serys, antes de começar a ler seu parecer final na Comissão Mista de Orçamento, na noite de ontem (20). Segundo ela, o cronograma dependerá das discussões que serão feitas entre os parlamentares da comissão.
Em relação a um possível reajuste maior do salário mínimo, Serys disse que para cada R$ 1 aumentado é necessário remanejar R$ 500 milhões no Orçamento, contanto os encargos previdenciários. Por isso, ela manteve o valor de R$ 540.
Sobre o corte de R$ 3 bilhões, pedido pelo Ministério do Planejamento e atendido no relatório final, a senadora disse que apenas acatou o pleito do Executivo. “O corte chegou do Executivo e a gente não questionou”.
Segundo ela, no entanto, esses recursos, em caso de arrecadação maior, ficam como reserva de contingência. Serys separou R$ 1 bilhão que ficará a cargo do Ministério do Desenvolvimento Social e Combate à Fome e poderá servir para aumentar o número de beneficiários ou o valor recebido por família. Para pendências judiciais de aposentados, foram reservados R$ 2 bilhões. (ABr)

description.hltext_display: Balyoz ve Dink hakimleri 'bizi emekli edin' dedi... Bakanlık ikiletmedi
description.content:
ANKARA - HSYK’nın görevden aldığı Balyoz davası hakimi İstanbul 10. Ağır Ceza Mahkemesi Başkanı Zafer Başkurt ile Hrant Dink davasına bakan 14. Ağır Ceza Mahkemesi’nin başkanı Erkan Canak, emekliliklerini istedi. Vatan gazetesinden Kemal Göktaş’ın haberine göre her iki hakimin talepleri Bakanlık Personel Genel Müdürlüğü tarafından kabul edildi.
HSYK, Balyoz davasına bakacak olan mahkemenin Başkanı Başkurt’u, davanın ilk duruşmasından 48 saat önce Gebze’ye düz hakim olarak atamış, Dink davasına bakan Hakim Erkan Canak’ı da görevden alarak Sakarya’ya düz hakim olarak atanmasına karar vermişti.
EMEKLİLİĞE BAKANLIK ONAYIHer iki hakim de yeni görev yerlerine gitmek yerine emekli olmayı tercih etti. İki hakimin emeklilik dilekçesi Adalet Bakanlığı Personel Genel Müdürlüğü tarafından kabul edildi. Önceki gün yürürlüğe giren yeni HSYK Kanunu’na göre hakim ve savcıların emeklilik işlemlerinin HSYK Genel Sekreterliği tarafından yürütülmesi gerekiyor.
Ancak Kurul’un henüz genel sekterliği oluşturmaması nedeniyle, sekretarya hizmetleri Bakanlık Personel Genel Müdürlüğü tarafından yürütülüyor. Bakanlık da bu durumu dikkate alarak Canak ve Başkurt’un emeklilik işlemlerini kendisi yürüttü ve durumlarını inceleyerek emekli olmalarına karar verdi.
SORUŞTURMA DEVAM EDECEK
Adalet Bakanlığı Teftiş Kurulu her iki başkanın görev yerlerinin değiştirilmesini haklarında yürütülen disiplin soruşturması kapsamında önermişti. Teftiş Kurulu Canak hakkında “uyuşturucu davalarına bakan avukatlarla yakın ilişkide olduğu, iş takibi yapan bir kadınla gayri ahlaki ilişki kurduğu” iddialarına ilişkin, Başkurt hakkında ise “uyuşturucu davası sanıkları ile yakın ilişki ve para karşığı tahliye girişiminde bulunması” iddialarıyla soruşturma yürütüyor.
Her iki soruşturma da 25 Ağustos 2009 tarihinde başlatılmıştı. İddialar eski Adalet Bakanı Seyfi Oktay’ın Ergenekon soruşturması kapsamında gözaltına alınmasının ardından gündeme gelmişti. Her iki hakim hakkında yürütülen disiplin soruşturmaları ise devam edecek. Ancak bu disiplin soruşturmaları sonunda ceza davası açılmasına gerek görüldüğü takdirde her iki hakim hakkında Yargıtay’da dava açılacak. (Vatan)

description.hltext_display: Acqua Marcia: Rothschild nuovo advisor del piano (MF)
description.content:
MILANO (MF-DJ)--Il gruppo Acqua Marcia di Francesco Bellavista Caltagirone sta dando gli ultimi ritocchi a un nuovo piano industriale che coinvolgera' le quattro principali aree di business (immobiliare, turistico, aeroportuale e porti turistici).
Per dare maggiore respiro alle attivita', si legge in un articolo di MF, Acqua Marcia avrebbe nominato Rothschild come advisor per sottoporre una richiesta di standstill alle banche finanziatrici. red/alb alberto.chimenti@mfdowjones.it
(END) Dow Jones Newswires
